reviewText: She has the highest singing voice ever recored and is so beautiful wish there was more4 from her short opera career

I was delighted to be able to see and hear Mado Robin sing on this VHS tape, but was disappointed that it only ran for approximately 22 minutes. I suppose that there is just not that much available on video. A nice treat for me.

Mado Robin she was the geatest soprano of all times, The highest note ever produced by the human voice (not falsetto notes) full rounded notes, she had color,character, and full control of her amazing voice, it was a great loss to the world of opera, when she died so young. Would like to know if she ever made any movies, or are there any video's, films etc. of any of her performances, other than the one listed "Mado Robin Live" as I have that one? Also another great voice was the late "Lily Pons" another terrific, wonderful,great lady of the opera,theatre,films,live performances,and entertaining the troops during World War ll and performing all over the world.  May they both be remembered for their great contributions to the world of Opera, and the performng arts of music.
